channel.title: Pleb Tunes by Brrreadfan
channel.itunes:author: Brrreadfan
channel.description:
Just a Bitcoin pleb butchering your favourite tunes!

nostr: brrreadfan@getalby.com
channel.generator: Handcrafted by Brrreadfan from Demu Open Source Template v0.1.1

item.title: The Misbits - Die, Die My Dollar
item.description:
The Misbits - Die, Die My Dollar

Original: "Die, Die My Darling" by The Misfits

Lyrics Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RT2ZlC-IXTY"

Lyrics:

Die, die, die my Dollar

Don’t shudder at Proof of Work

Die, die, die my Dollar

Just print your pretty lies

I’m not feeding you again

And no-one’s feeding you in hell

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

Our future's built on orange blocks

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

We plant a seed and just let it grow

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

And we know it is in our power

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

Better gold for a better world

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

And now our life gains so much more

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

Die, die, die my Dollar

Don’t shudder at Proof of Work

Die, die, die my Dollar

Just shut your greedy mouth

I’m not feeding you again

And no-one’s feeding you in hell

Dollar die! Dollar die!

Go make some Bitcoin babies!

item.title: NakamoTool - Right In Two
item.description:
NakamoTool - Right in Two

Original: "Right in Two" by Tool (album: 10,000 days)

Lyrics video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZGJ7TIngaBY

Lyrics:

Austrians on the sideline

muzzled and abused

Why did Keynesians give these humans Fiat?

Now they’re all confused

Don’t these talking monkeys know

they bleed themselves and snuff each other out?

Undermine their golden time for silly money,

boom-and-bust is bound to divide it

Right in two

Austrians on the sideline

baffled and amused

Someone blessed them all with Bitcoin

And this is what they choose?

Monkey printing money, killing monkey,

no more peace no common ground

Silly monkeys,

Give them crumbs, they forge a state

and governments are bound to divide them

Right in two

Right in two

Monkey printing money, killing monkey,

Won’t this spiral turn around?

Clever monkeys,

Cypherpunks build bottom up,

Make tyrants topple down

How they’ve survived

so misguided without Satoshi?

Abundance hunting creatures

shall not squander all their energy

But grow with every halving

conscious of their fleeting time here

Cut the mining reward right in two

Cut the mining reward right in two

Cut the mining reward right in two

Cut the mining reward right in two

Mine, verify, store the sun, clear the sky

They mine, verify, sow the seeds for their heirs

They mine, verify, no more blood, for more love

They mine, verify, world is decentralizing

Keynesians on the sideline again

Banished by deflation and reason

Keynesians on the sideline again

Finally all those Fiat wars will end

Cut the mining reward right in two

Cut the mining reward right in two

Cut the mining reward right in two

Right in two

Right in two

Backing-Track source: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axU6jNL52E4

item.title: Fiat Prison Blues (Chaum E. Cash)
item.description:
Lyrics Video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-hWLegNiNVc"

I fear inflation's coming

The rainbow chart is bent

And I ain't seen the sunshine since

I've overspent

I'm stuck at Fiat Prison

Blocktime keeps draggin' on

But that chain keeps rollin'

The rules are set in stone

When I was just a baby

Satoshi told me 'Son,

Always be a good boy,

Don't ever trade your funds"

But I joined crypto casinos

Just to watch them die

When I hear those shitcoins blowin'

I kiss my sats goodbye

(Sue 'em!)

I bet there's rich whole-coiners

Driving fancy Lambo cars

They probably pay their coffee

With Lightning-zaps on mars

Well I know I had it comin'

I never held my keys

But those plebs keep on stackin'

And FOMO tortures me

I guess I'm free to leave this prison

If that private key was mine

I'd back it up and move it

into cold storage offline

Far from Fiat Prison

I'd run my DCA

And I'd let that orange pill lesson

Blow my mind away

item.title: Bitcoin - Open Up Your Mind (Brrreadfan)
item.description:
Bitcoin - Open Up Your Mind

based on the song "Breadfan" - originally by 70s band BUDGIE, later covered by METALLICA

R.I.P. Burke Shelley (1950-2022)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vOYgg8aEYJk

Lyrics:

Bitcoin

open up your mind

open up your purse

break the fiat curse

never never gonna lose it

Bitcoin

never go away

never give an inch

divide everything into 21 Million

Bitcoin

you hodl strong

make long time Friends

lower time Preference

what a tool

Shitcoin

give it all away

stay a dog

stay a kitty

watch a punk copy-paste your NFT

Laser ray 'til hundred k

gotta slay you on Twitter

who's the man with all the fiat money?

come on! Keep it all in sats

hitch a ride from the lows to the highs

if you're gonna be a based Boy

Bitcoin

you hodl strong

make long time Friends

lower time Preference

what a tool

Shitcoin

give it all away

stay a dog

stay a kitty

watch a punk copy-paste your NFT

Time to throw my keys away

cause I'm never gonna stay

cause I

I don't need it

Don't you feel it in your veins?

Fixed your money

now fix your world

but I

I'm leaving

Bitcoin

open up your mind

open up your purse

break the fiat curse

never never gonna lose it

Bitcoin

never go away

never give an inch

divide everything into 21 Million

Bitcoin

you hodl strong

make long time Friends

lower time Preference

what a tool

Shitcoin

give it all away

stay a dog

stay a kitty

watch a punk copy-paste your NFT
